SMTools v1.4 API Documentation



This document contains the API documentation for all the SMTools (version 1.4) classes.
The framework was designed for the Java 2 Platform Standard Edition 6.0 (Mustang) or higher.

See: Description

Application GUI development 
Package Description
smtools.application
Provides an easy-to-use interface for working with a Swing based GUI.
smtools.application.registry
Provides a framework for dealing with a global registry in SMTools based applications.
smtools.application.util
Provides utility classes for developping SMTools-based GUIs.
Exception handling 
Package Description
smtools.exceptions
Provides various classes for exception handling.
Mathematical utilities 
Package Description
smtools.math
Provides some basic useful mathematical operations.
smtools.math.lslr
Provides an implementation for least squares linear regression of 2D data.
smtools.math.quadmapping
Provides an implementation for perspective mappings of convex 2D quadrilaterals.
smtools.math.statistics
Provides an implementation for estimating empirical probability and cumulative distributions.
Miscellaneous 
Package Description
smtools.miscellaneous
Provides various classes for converting strings, numbers, dates, times, ...
Swing related 
Package Description
smtools.swing.dialogs
Provides various dialog boxes.
smtools.swing.util
Provides various functional classes for Java's Swing framework.


This document contains the API documentation for all the SMTools (version 1.4) classes.
The framework was designed for the Java 2 Platform Standard Edition 6.0 (Mustang) or higher.

When using this framework, please use the following reference:

    SMTools API Documentation (2003-2012)
